creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: jacket has open front; two kinds of braid with embroidered pink, red and green patches; red printed fabric strips on front bottom edge; woven red and tan band on sleeve back and around upper arm; sequins on upper arm; bottom back has applique with embroidered flowers in red, green and pink
title: Jacket, from a three-piece set
